solution.text:
You must have noticed that height of an individual is more or less similar to that of some family member.
This is because height depends on the genes inherited from parents.
Similarly, Rahul's nose is very similar to that of Sumant's because Rahul inherited his father's genes.

content.text:
Rahul lives with his parents, Sumant and Nimisha.
His friends keep telling him that his nose is very similar to that of his father's.
What do you think is the reason?

incorrect.text: They live under the same roof
